description: Dalton Briggs and Vincent Diaz are enjoying some discrete fun while Dalton’s parents are out of the house. Vincent goes down on him just in time for his stepdad Dirk Caber to walk in. It’s a close call for Dalton as he keeps the man whose lips are around his cock a secret from Dirk while they’re all in the same room together.
title: Stepdick Part 1
